markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dracomancer](/Feats.aspx?ID=1280) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=224" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 15 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your inborn arcane power manifests as your exemplar's most time-honored spells. Choose one 1st-level spell and one 2nd-level spell from those listed for a dragon spellcaster of your draconic exemplar's type (such as [_alarm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=7), [_blur_](/Spells.aspx?ID=28), [_invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), and [_true strike_](/Spells.aspx?ID=345) for a [black dragon](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=165) exemplar). Links to all types of dragons can be found [here](/Traits.aspx?ID=50). You can cast each of these spells once per day as arcane innate spells. You gain the trained proficiency rank in arcane spell attack rolls and spell DCs, and your key spellcasting ability is Charisma.

<title level="2">Dracomancer leads to...</title>
[Dragonblood Paragon](/Feats.aspx?ID=2387), [Elite Dracomancer](/Feats.aspx?ID=1282)
name: Dracomancer
